description:
Istio is a Kubernetes-based, open source service mesh that provides advanced networking, security, and observability features for microservices in a cloud-native environment. This dashboard is crafted to provide you with an overview of, detailed information about, and performance data for your Istio services.

**Further reading:**

- [Datadog Istio Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/istio/)
- [Istio Docs](https://istio.io/latest/)
- [Istio Metrics Docs](https://istio.io/latest/docs/reference/config/metrics/)
title: Istio Overview

definition.content: Istio is a Kubernetes-based, open source service mesh that provides advanced networking, security, and observability features for microservices in a cloud-native environment. This dashboard is crafted to provide you with an overview of, detailed information about, and performance data for your Istio services.
Istio Overview shows a summary of all reporting Istio instances, as well as related monitors and their statuses.

Citadel Stats

Metrics for security and identity management

Galley Stats

Metrics for configuration validation, distribution, and discovery

Pilot Stats

Metrics for service discovery, configuration distribution to Envoy proxies, traffic management, and resiliency features

definition.title: Time Proxy is in Push Queue
Failed or Skipped Sidecar Injection Requests

definition.content:
Requests and Responses

Metrics for both requests and responses. These metrics help monitor the performance and behavior of the traffic within the service mesh.

queries.name: query1
queries.query: sum:istio.mesh.request.count.total{(response_code:2* OR response_code:3*) AND $cluster_name AND $istio_proxy_image AND $destination_service_name AND $destination_service AND $destination_workload_namespace AND $destination_workload AND $source_workload AND $source_workload_namespace AND $response_code} by {destination_service,source_workload,source_workload_namespace,destination_workload,destination_workload_namespace,response_code,destination_service_name,destination_service_namespace,destination_version}.as_count()

queries.name: query2
queries.query: sum:istio.mesh.request.count.total{(response_code:4* OR response_code:5* OR response_code:0) AND $cluster_name AND $istio_proxy_image AND $destination_service_name AND $destination_service AND $destination_workload_namespace AND $destination_workload AND $source_workload AND $source_workload_namespace AND $response_code} by {destination_service,source_workload,source_workload_namespace,destination_workload,destination_workload_namespace,response_code,destination_service_name,destination_service_namespace,destination_version}.as_count()

queries.name: query1
queries.query: sum:istio.mesh.request.count.total{(response_code:4* OR response_code:5* OR response_code:0) AND $cluster_name AND $istio_proxy_image AND $destination_service_name AND $destination_service AND $destination_workload_namespace AND $destination_workload AND $source_workload AND $source_workload_namespace AND $response_code} by {destination_service,source_workload,source_workload_namespace,destination_workload,destination_workload_namespace,response_code,destination_service_name,destination_service_namespace,destination_version}.as_count()

queries.name: query2
queries.query: sum:istio.mesh.request.count.total{(response_code:4* OR response_code:5* OR response_code:0) AND $cluster_name AND $istio_proxy_image AND $destination_service_name AND $destination_service AND $destination_workload_namespace AND $destination_workload AND $source_workload AND $source_workload_namespace AND $response_code}.as_count()

definition.content:
Pilot Agent

Istio Pilot agent runs alongside the application container within the same pod and is responsible for managing the Istio sidecar proxy
